segments.text: The kitchen is so domestic, yet I'm struck by the chaos that it holds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down the cabinet doors, a small flood in the midst of routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the peaceful garden outside and this mayhem inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the splashes of water as the boy climbs higher.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, but the danger sends shivers through me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Does he realize how quickly things can go wrong on that wobbly stool?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch, holding my breath, wishing I could freeze this moment before something breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR
